participant_1.background:
I sometimes lie to my parents about where I'm going so I can hang out with my boyfriend.
i am the youngest sibling in my family.
i go running a lot.
i play the trumpet.
I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.

participant_2.background:
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.
I'm going to hike some of the Appalachian Trail with my dragon friend.
i m a simple man.
I celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog.
I make sure to get plenty of exercise, even if my diet is not the best.

content.text: So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to hike, go to the dog park with my French bulldog, and spend time with my family.
Oh, that sounds fun! I like to go running and play trumpet.
I've never played the trumpet before, but it sounds like fun!
It's a great instrument! What's your favorite thing about hiking?
I love being outdoors and getting some exercise. I also love seeing the beautiful scenery.
Me too! I love being able to see all the different plants and animals.
That's what I love about it too! What's your favorite thing about your French bulldog?
I love his goofy personality! He's always making me laugh.
That's great! I'm glad you have a dog that makes you happy
